channel.title: Source suggestions
channel.description:
im looking for a unedited source i want it to have most skils at least. i can creat myself what wont work so that doesent matter to much. one with out any npcs and all working files like itemspawnpoints.java item2.java (or 3 either or long as one can hold my large amount of drops) no shops, no extra objects.
just teh basic things to run a server. and all the javafiles so i can put all my things ni a fix it up to work.
and easy to edit unlke testscape. testscape mising so many thigns only 10% tuts work :\ if you say "download list" Gtfo my thread. you cant read what the sources have on there... <_<
thanks. also one that has no errors when you first download it like pimpscape...
[b]This includes No:[/b] Pimpscape (sucks) Testscape (stupid sucks and useless) Whitescape (missing way to mcuh files i need) satan isle (i tryed one of these and there oposite of what i want 100%!!!!!) Evilscape SATAN PROJECT GloryScape v.# [i]PestCScape (? is there anythign other then pestcontrol? if there isint ill take it)[/i] shorty5855scape V.#.# (pk) GangScape V# (based on pimpscape) Fr33sc4p3 Pkz (pk) piratepkscape (pk) OriginalScape V# (close but no added to many thigns uneedable :\) Horror-Moss...

item.title: Source suggestions
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

mage_owner:

Hmm…You Should Try a 458 source/client…if you really want a challenge =P

i would but idk where to get one. :\

Sick of Air:

Just get Pimpscape, really easy to use.

just tryed it again and its useless crude. it looks like a pk server and nothign seemes to work…
i cant work with pimpscape everythign looks stupid. i want a unedited one not one it will take me a week to change back into a normal server.

Read full topic

item.title: Source suggestions
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

mage_owner:

Get a few edited servers, and take which files you want, add them together, and make them work with each other…that is about the best advise i got…sorry

thats why i was looking for suggestion. i coulda just added in all the files i got from my older source but as i said its to annoying doing tones of editing for them. waste of time.

Read full topic
